{HITNAME} Trouble Ticket.

  • If you experienced a technical problem with the HIT named "{HITNAME}," you can report about your issues here.

  • Important! Do not take this HIT if you did not experience any issue (e.g. to say thank you, or to report no issue), or if you did not participate in the HIT {HITNAME}. Please wait at least 24 hours to report a missing payment. All invalid submissions will be rejected.
